title: @Riot, could you give a Rek'Sai size estimate?
body: I know her in-game size isn't accurate to her size in lore, but The Terror Beneath video isn't a whole lot to go off of. The LOL Wiki describes her being the size of a house more or less, but it isn't cited and a rundown on her release Q&A reveals no Rioter actually gave a size estimate; maybe I've just miss that one post that says it. But can a Wrioter give us a ballpark range? 15-18 meters, going off The Terror Beneath and her model?

Tough to say. But going off the _Terror Beneath_. 

Lets say the camel like creatures are the same size as a dromedary camel. Which on avg is ~ 1,100 lbs, ~10ft long and ~7ft for a adult male. When she attacks the creature she appears at least 2.5-3x as tall and 5-6x as massive. 

https://imgflip.com/gif/yros0

So using the dromedary size as the base. I would say you're looking at a animal thats about **18ft - 21ft tall** (at the dorsal). Probably about **50-60ft long** to her tail.  Since she appears to be an invetebrate, her weight would be much harder to determine. 

So basically, assuming shes around 18+ft tall and 50+ft long, she would be very similar in size to Spinosaurus who is estimated to be very similar dimensions. 

https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/a/ae/Largesttheropods.png

I would've said she was grey whale sized, because that looks accurate to me:

http://www.statesymbolsusa.org/sites/statesymbolsusa.org/files/gray-whale-size.jpg

They grow to be around fifteen meters long (50ish feet) and weigh in around 40ish tons.
I would honestly guess more around half the size or 3/4 of the whale which is still pretty big.
